question: Which Indian doctor has been  honoured with the 'Global Asian of the Year 2018-19' award at the Asian Business & Social Forum 2019?
explanation: Dr. Hema Divakar, a Bengaluru-based medical doctor, has been honoured with the \'Global Asian of the Year 2018-19\' award in Dubai recently for her yeomen services and contributions to the women\'s healthcare ecosystem, in India. Dr. Divakar  received the award at the Asian Business & Social Forum 2019 under the \'In Service of the Society and the Nation\' category from UAE\'s Trade Promotion Director Mohammed Naser Hamdan Al Zaabi. The award is conferred on those who stand out for vision, action and ingenuity and represent contemporary ideas to make global impact.
